name: git_applet_builder
title: git Applet Builder
summary: Builds an applet from a git repo
description:
Builds your applet from a git repository.

The Applet Builder does the following:

* Clones your source from a git repo, optionally using credentials specified by you
* Builds with `./configure` and `make && make install` (optional; only run if a `./configure` file and a makefile are found, respectively)
* Uploads the resulting applet to DNAnexus

inputSpec.name: repo_url
inputSpec.label: git URL
inputSpec.help: URL of git repo to be cloned

inputSpec.name: ref
inputSpec.label: Ref to build
inputSpec.help: Branch, tag, or commit ID to be checked out

inputSpec.name: credentials
inputSpec.label: Private key file
inputSpec.help: File containing private key to use to authenticate to the git server

inputSpec.name: extra_flags
inputSpec.label: Extra flags for dx-build-applet
inputSpec.help: Any extra flags to be added to the dx-build-applet call
